channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Charlie Woods, Cameron Kuchar commit to Junior Players
item.description: Charlie Woodsand Cameron Kuchar will double the number of sons of past Players Championship winners to compete in the American Junior Golf AssociationJunior Players ChampionshipAug. 28-31 at the Players Stadium Course at TPC Sawgrass.

item.title: Vote: Who is Sarasota-Manatee's all-time best state championship softball team
item.description: The Herald-Tribune has gone back and documented the fast-pitch softball teams that have won state championships.

item.title: Today's exclusive Prime deals are rich: Bang + Olufsen, Olaplex, Away
item.description: Amazon Prime Day 2025is pulling out all the stops on thesecond day of the sale.

item.title: Get my favorite Vera Bradley Weekender Bag for 53% off at Amazon
item.description: When it comes to my shopping habits, I'm a pretty simple gal: I see a stylish Vera Bradley bag on sale, I add it to my shopping cart and then I report back on the discount to all of you—because who can resist a great fashion deal?

item.title: The 10-in-1 Ninja air fryer is $70 off for Amazon Prime Day
item.description: Air fryers are not just a 2020 trend. My air fryer has been a regular part of my cooking rotation, because it heats up quicker than the oven, cooks faster and leaves certain foods with the perfect crunch (no oil required). TheNinja Air Fryer and Toaster Oven Combois a reader-favorite this week and right now, it is 23% off during Amazon Prime Day.

item.title: Jacksonville’s Nic Advances to Love Island USA Season 7…
item.description: With the 'Love Island USA' Season 7 finaleairing Sunday, July 13, Jacksonville native Nick Vansteenberghe has emerged as one of the season’s standout Islanders and a fan favorite to watch.

item.title: Craving a Snack Wrap? Fan-favorite returns to McDonald's…
item.description: McDonald's isbringing back the Snack Wrap for good,after years of fans demanding its return.

item.title: Amazon Prime Day deals on pool pumps, vacuums, LED…
item.description: Today marks the second day of Amazon’s biggest online shopping sale of the year.Amazon Prime Daystarted as a one-day sales event in 2015 to celebrate the company’s 20th anniversary.

item.title: Sarasota officers free woman trapped in burning car after crash
item.description: Released body camera footage shows the momentSarasota Police officers rescued an unconscious womanfrom a fiery three-car crash in late June.

item.title: Supreme Court rejects Florida's appeal to enforce immigration law
item.description: WASHINGTON − Florida can't enforce a controversialnew lawtargeting undocumented immigrants entering Florida, theSupreme Courtdetermined on July 9 in rejecting anemergency appeal from the state.
